name: Souper Hero (R_Goulart)
description:
Made for A GAME BY ITS COVER 2022 . I can't do all the things I would like to do within this time but I did my best, I will improve the game little by little.

The game was based on art created by Cassandra Freire, and your objective is to exorcise the vegetables to throw them in the cauldron and make soup.

CONTROL

KEY

  • MOVE: Arrow keys
  • JUMP: Z
  • ATTACK: X
  • PAUSE: Enter

JOYSTICK

  • MOVE: D-PAD or Left Stick
  • JUMP: A
  • ATTACK: X
  • PAUSE: START

Game by Róger Goulart (Instagram: @roger_goulart)
